Name: Luis Antonio
description:
Antonio is 37 years old. He is in a common-law marriage with a live-in partner and has a 13-year-old daughter who is in school. Antonio has vision problems, but this has not stopped him from fighting to move his humble household forwards. He makes a living raising animals and growing produce such as potatoes and corn.

He is requesting a loan to invest in his potato crop so that he can improve his crop and have a better income to cover his family's needs and his eye treatment.
